if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @bilingual tinyint, @l char(1) if @@form in ('020', '220') select @bilingual = 1, @l = 'V' else select @bilingual = 0, @l = @@language select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0'
select ltrim(so_ct) as so_ct, t_tien, t_tien_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, t_tien, @l) as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, t_tien_nt, @l) as t_tien_nt_in_word, case when @bilingual = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, t_tien, 'E') else '' end as t_tien_in_word2, case when @bilingual = 1 then dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(ma_nt, t_tien_nt, 'E') else '' end as t_tien_nt_in_word2, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, b.dia_chi, rtrim(a.ma_kh) as ma_kh, b.ten_kh, b.ten_kh2, a.dien_giai from m37$000000 a left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec
declare @key varchar(128) select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintPV0Tran @@language, @key, 'd37$000000', @@id, @bilingual
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;
